description: Defenders Ross White, 18, and 21-year-old Steve Tomassen extend their contracts with Conference side Wrexham.
title: Wrexham: Ross White and Steve Tomassen sign new contracts
title_page: Wrexham: Ross White and Steve Tomassen sign new contracts - BBC Sport
maintext:
Wrexham defenders Ross White and Steve Tomassen have extended their contracts with the Conference club.
White, 18 and 21-year-old Tomassen have committed themselves to the Dragons until the end of the 2015-2016 season.
"I feel things are going in the right direction and are good at the moment," Tomassen said.
"You have to go out and play like every game could be your last, so you have to prove yourself each week to keep your shirt. Which I hope is what I'm doing."
